Immerse yourself in the enigmatic yet refined scent crafted from therapeutic ingredients like sandalwood, palo santo, cedarwood, and musk. Experience this scent alone or enrich your existing collection, as this perfume also serves as a perfume enhancer to offer a more sensual, calming, and uplifting experience that intensifies as your body warms. This fragrance serves as a beacon of alignment and balance, inviting healing and positivity into your life. It triggers the activation of the Crown and Root Chakras, promoting a grounding and spiritual connection. Infused with the genuine energy of ethically-sourced Smoky Quartz, Ascent to Detox is known to neutralize toxic, low-vibration energy, freeing you from heavy energy. This stone is known to foster emotional calmness, alleviate stress and anxiety, and enhances mental clarity. At ASCENTION, we seamlessly integrate aromatherapy into luxurious, clean fragrances that elevate your emotional state. Infuse your scent with intention, and harness its essence with every spray. We are proudly the first of its kind, a disruptive perfume experience that infuses purpose and intention into every fragrance, creating a cosmic manifestation experience.
